Package backEnd

Class Store

java.lang.Object
backEnd.Store
public class Store
extends java.lang.Object
Store is a place to trade good for player
There are 5 stores in total, each is situated in a unique island
Author:
Aerinn Nguyen, Bede Skinner-Vennell

  • Constructor Details

    • Store

      public Store()
      Constructor of a store Constructs an empty store

    • Store

      public Store​(java.lang.String name, int multiplier)
      Constructor of a store
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the store
      multiplier - The price of the item or weapon when sold by the store will be multiplied with this

  • Method Details

    • buysItem

      public boolean buysItem​(Item item)
      Check if store can buy an item from the player
      Parameters:
      item - The item that the player wants to sell to the store
      Returns:
      true (if the item can be bought by the store) or false (otherwise)

    • buysWeapon

      public boolean buysWeapon​(Weapon weapon)
      Check if store can buy a weapon from the player
      Parameters:
      weapon - The weapon that the player wants to sell to the store
      Returns:
      true (if the weapon can be bought by the store) or false (otherwise)
